00038 class Visitor
00039 {
00040   public:
00041     virtual void visitUnion(RightPart *, RightPart *) = 0;
00042     virtual void visitConcat(RightPart *, RightPart *) = 0;
00043     virtual void visitKleeneClosure(RightPart *) = 0;
00044     virtual void visitPositiveClosure(RightPart *) = 0;
00045     virtual void visitOption(RightPart *) = 0;
00046     virtual void visitTerminal(Terminal *) = 0;
00047     virtual void visitNonTerminal(NonTerminal *) = 0;
00048     virtual void visitEmpty() = 0;
00049  protected:
00050     Visitor() {}
00051 };
